content:
From: Stepan Holub <cl-isabelle-users@lists.cam.ac.uk>
The second component of split_pairs in HOL/Product_Type
<https://isabelle.in.tum.de/library/HOL/HOL/Product_Type.html> is
invisible due to "and".

Stepan

From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
Thanks, will fix it.

Tobias

On 10/01/2025 16:31, Stepan Holub (via cl-isabelle-users Mailing List) wrote:

The second component of split_pairs in HOL/Product_Type <https://
isabelle.in.tum.de/library/HOL/HOL/Product_Type.html> is invisible due to "and".

Stepan

smime.p7s
